keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop sending money to Brussels and spend it on training doctors and nurses instead. Cut wasteful administration and redirect savings into front line services. Stop health tourism. End hospital parking charges.

More grammar schools and technical skills colleges, vocational education courses and apprenticeships. Give parents the right to choose where their children go to school. Protect rural schools and home schooling.
Get police officers back on the beat and stop the scrapping of front-line police jobs. Adopt a zero tolerance approach to anti-social behaviour, joy-riders and crack down on nuisance neighbours.
Stop HS2, save our Green Belt, protect Solihull Hospital, housing and jobs for local people.

issues.education: More grammar schools and technical skills colleges, vocational education courses and apprenticeships. Give parents the right to choose where their children go to school. Protect rural schools and home schooling.
issues.environment: Stop HS2, save our Green Belt
issues.health: Support a free NHS. Stop sending money to Brussels and spend it on training doctors and nurses instead. Cut wasteful administration and redirect savings into front line services. Stop health tourism. End hospital parking charges.
issues.lawCrime: Get police officers back on the beat and stop the scrapping of front-line police jobs. Adopt a zero tolerance approach to anti-social behaviour, joy-riders and crack down on nuisance neighbours.

community.content: Safer communities. Get police officers back on the beat and stop the scrapping of front-line police jobs. Adopt a zero tolerance approach to anti-social behaviour, joy-riders and crack down on nuisance neighbours.
